description: Nice and clean status about your server.

panels.description:
The Processor(_total)\% Privileged Time counter shows the percent of time that the processor is spent executing in Kernel (or Privileged) mode.

The Processor(_total)\% User Time counter shows the percent of time that the processor(s) is spent executing in User mode.
panels.title: CPU Usage %

panels.description: Processor Queue Length is the number of threads in the processor queue. Unlike the disk counters, this counter counters, this counter shows ready threads only, not threads that are running. There is a single queue for processor time even on computers with multiple processors. Therefore, if a computer has multiple processors, you need to divide this value by the number of processors servicing the workload. A sustained processor queue of less than 10 threads per processor is normally acceptable, dependent of the workload.
panels.title: Processor Queue Length

panels.description: Context Switches/sec 指计算机上的所有处理器全都从一个线程切换到另一个线程的综合速率。当正在运行的线程自动放弃处理器时出现上下文开关，由一个有更高优先就绪的线程占先或在用户模式和特权(内核)模式之间切换以使用执行或分系统服务。它是在计算机上的所有处理器上运行的所有线程的 Thread\\Context Switches/sec的总数，并且用切换次数来计算。在系统和线程对象上有上下文开关计数器。此计数器显示上两个采样中观察到的值的差除以采样间隔时间所得的值。
panels.title: System Context Switches/sec
Memory Total, Cached, Available and Free

panels.description: Pages/sec is the rate at which pages are read from or written to disk to resolve hard page faults. This counter is a primary indicator of the kinds of faults that cause system-wide delays. It is the sum of Memory\\Pages Input/sec and Memory\\Pages Output/sec. It is counted in numbers of pages, so it can be compared to other counts of pages, such as Memory\\Page Faults/sec, without conversion. It includes pages retrieved to satisfy faults in the file system cache (usually requested by applications) non-cached mapped memory files.
panels.title: Memory Pages and Page Inputs

panels.description:
Avg. Disk sec/Read 指以秒计算的在此盘上读取数据的所需平均时间。

Avg. Disk sec/Write 指以秒计算的在此盘上写入数据的所需平均时间。
panels.title: Read/Write Latency

panels.description: % Registry Quota In Use 指系统当前使用的 Total Registry Quota Allowed 的百分比。此计数器仅显示当前百分比值；它不是平均值。
panels.title: Registry Quota In Use

panels.description:
Percentage of pages that were found in the buffer pool without having to incur a read from disk.

≥ 95%   好   
≥ 90%   正常  
< 90%   需关注

item.filter: SQLServer: Buffer Manager: Buffer cache hit ratio

panels.title: Buffer Cache Hit Ratio

panels.description: Database pages  :  缓冲池中数据库内容的页数
panels.title: Database pages

panels.description: Checkpoint pages/sec  :   Checkpoint的执行频率，若执行的频率过高。则说明服务器过于频繁的修改数据。
panels.title: Checkpoint pages

panels.description: Lazy writes/sec  :  若懒写入过于频繁，说明没有空闲的缓冲区供使用，内存可能存在一定瓶颈。“惰性编写器”是一个系统进程，用于成批刷新脏的过期的缓冲区（包含更改的缓冲区，必须将这些更改写回磁盘，才能将缓冲区重用于其他页），并使它们可用于用户进程。
panels.title: Lazy writes/sec

panels.description: Page life expectancy  :  指示页面在没有引用的情况下，在此节点的缓冲池中停留的时间（以秒计）。此值若降低说明，服务器频繁查询数据库中数据。

item.filter: SQLServer: Buffer Manager: Page life expectancy

panels.title: Page life expectancy

panels.description:
Target Server Memory (KB)  
Total Server Memory (KB)  

理想上能使用内存量与内存管理器提交的内存量。若此两值存在差异则说明内存异常。
panels.title: Total / Target Server Memory

panels.description:
Memory Grants Pending

指等待分配内存的进程数量，若此值过高或内存或磁盘存在一定瓶颈。
panels.title: Memory Grants Pending

panels.description:
Access Methods 监视用于访问数据库中存储的数据的方法有助于确定是否可以通过添加或修改索引、添加或移动分区、添加文件或文件组、对索引进行碎片整理或者重写查询来提高查询性能。 
Access Methods 计数器也可用于监视数据库中数据、索引和可用空间的数量，从而指示每个服务器实例的数据卷和碎片。索引的碎片过多会降低性能。

Page Splits/sec : 每秒由于索引页溢出而发生的页拆分数。此数据越大表示某表的修改频率较高，且要确认该索引是否适合建立该字段上。

Workfiles Created/sec : 每秒创建的工作文件数

Worktables Created/sec : 每秒创建的工作表数

Full Scans/sec ： 每秒 SQL 做全表扫描数目

Index Scans/sec ： 每秒 SQL 做索引扫描数目
panels.title: Access Methods

panels.description: 平均每秒用户连接数据库的个数（个）
panels.title: User Connections

panels.description: 请求数
panels.title: Batch Requests/sec

panels.description: 每秒登录/登出次数（次/秒）
panels.title: Logins/Logouts

panels.description: 每个 SQL 有一个执行计划，执行计划的命中率（%）
panels.title: Plan Cache：Cache Hit Ratio

panels.description:
SQL Compilation/sec  :  平均每秒 SQL 编译次数（次/秒）

SQL Re-Compilation/sec  :  平均每秒 SQL 重编译次数（次/秒）
panels.title: SQL Compilation/sec and  SQL Re-Compilation/sec

panels.description: Number of active transactions for the database.
panels.title: Active Transactions

panels.description: 平均每秒锁请求的次数（次/秒）
panels.title: Lock Requests/sec

panels.description: 每秒要求调用者等待的锁请求数（次/秒）
panels.title: Lock waits

panels.description: 当前阻塞数量（个）
panels.title: Processes blocked

title: Windows Server 2008 R2
